alert.note: Alert for Northern Bristol; Southern Bristol; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 7:14AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Plymouth, central Bristol, northeastern Washington, northeastern Newport, eastern Kent, eastern Providence and Bristol Counties through 845 AM EDT... At 714 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Providence, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas near Providence and Fall River. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of heavy rainfall are forecast to continue this morning and afternoon. If prolonged heavy rainfall rates continue to occur over these areas, a flash flood warning may be issued. Locations impacted include... Providence, Fall River, Warwick, Cranston, Pawtucket, Taunton, East Providence, Dartmouth, Cumberland, North Providence, West Warwick, Johnston, North Attleborough, North Kingstown, Bristol, Attleboro, Smithfield, Lincoln, Central Falls and Norton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Northern Bristol; Southern Bristol; Western Plymouth
